body:
- What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. MCTS-C (6) or MMAB (8) with Haunted_Humans Deck vs. me with 2012gwAggro Deck (although I've changed my lists slightly, i.e. exchanged Noble Hierarch for Avacyn's Pilgrim for example)
2. I have a Blade Splicer + Golem Token, attack with Golem
3. AI has Champion of the Parish with p/t 3/3, a Doomed Traveler and a Nearheath Pilgrim.
4. AI double-blocks my Golem with Champion+Doomed Traveler, auto-assigns 1 Damage to Doomed Traveler, which is then killed, and 2 Damage to the 3/3 Champion, which survives. My Golem Token dies.

- What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
When double-blocked like this, I'd assign 3 first strike damage on the Champion, so that my Golem should kill the Champion and survive with 1 Damage taken from the Traveler in total.

- What version of the product are you using? On what operating system?
MAGARENA VERSION 1.29, JRE 1.6.0_33, OS Windows 7_6.1 x86
author: [firat.al...@googlemail.com](https://code.google.com/u/112109140426664196609/)
title: Double-Blocks: Damage Auto-Assign is unfavorable
